thread.title: BRIEF-Alkermes Announces FDA Acceptance For Review Of New Drug Application For Alks 5461

title: BRIEF-Alkermes Announces FDA Acceptance For Review Of New Drug Application For Alks 5461

organizations.name: new drug application for alks 5461 reuters staff

text:
April 16, 2018 / 10:53 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Alkermes Announces FDA Acceptance For Review Of New Drug Application For Alks 5461 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Alkermes Plc: 
* ALKERMES ANNOUNCES FDA ACCEPTANCE FOR REVIEW OF NEW DRUG APPLICATION FOR ALKS 5461 FOR THE ADJUNCTIVE TREATMENT OF MAJOR DEPRESSIVE DISORDER 
* ALKERMES PLC - FDA ACTION EXPECTED BY JAN. 31, 2019 
* ALKERMES - ALKS 5461 NDA FILING BASED ON RESULTS FROM A CLINICAL EFFICACY AND SAFETY PACKAGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
